amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part A of House Report 119-255 to authorize the Baltic Security Initiative to strengthen the armed forces of Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania to deter Russian aggression, increase interoperability, and support modernization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott, Austin amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Scott, Austin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott, Austin amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
